CustomReport.title: T1 Records for Decades
CustomReport.description: Gives total records for each decade. Always excludes zero abundance and Failed/pending verification records. Works on an individual species when run as a quick report from Taxon Dictionary or on a Taxon Group (wild card) when run from the main menu.

SQL.Where:
CREATE TABLE #Taxa (TLI_Key char(16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS, RecTLI_Key char(16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) INSERT INTO #Taxa (TLI_KEY,RecTLI_Key) SELECT DISTINCT TLI.Taxon_List_Item_Key, ITN.Recommended_Taxon_List_Item_Key FROM Taxon_List_Item TLI INNER JOIN Taxon_Version TV ON TV.Taxon_Version_Key = TLI.Taxon_Version_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_Group TG ON TG.Taxon_Group_Key = TV.Output_Group_Key INNER JOIN Index_Taxon_Name ITN ON TLI.Taxon_List_Item_Key = ITN.Taxon_List_Item_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_Determination TDET ON TDET.Taxon_List_Item_Key=TLI.TAXON_LIST_ITEM_KEY WHERE
CREATE TABLE #Main (Pref_TLI_Key char(16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS, decade char(3) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS , dCount int)
INSERT INTO #Main (pref_TLI_key,decade,dcount) SELECT #Taxa.RecTLI_Key, dbo.LCReturnDate(s.Vague_Date_end, s.Vague_Date_Type,'B') as decade, count(TOCC.taxon_occurrence_key ) as dCount FROM Taxon_occurrence TOCC INNER JOIN SAMPLE S ON TOCC.Sample_Key = S.Sample_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_Determination TDET ON TDET.Taxon_Occurrence_Key = TOCC.Taxon_Occurrence_Key INNER JOIN #Taxa ON TDET.Taxon_List_Item_Key = #Taxa.TLI_Key INNER JOIN Survey_Event SE ON SE.Survey_Event_key = S.Survey_Event_Key LEFT JOIN User_Survey_Restriction USR ON USR.Survey_Key = SE.Survey_Key AND
WHERE TDET.PREFERRED = 1 AND USR.Name_Key IS NULL
AND Tocc.zero_abundance = 0 AND Tocc.Verified <> 1 AND S.vague_Date_Type not in('U','Y-','C-','S')
GROUP BY #Taxa.RecTLI_Key,dbo.LCReturnDate(s.Vague_Date_end, s.Vague_Date_Type,'B')
SELECT PREF_TLI_KEY,
SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE<190 THEN QTY END) AS [BEFORE 1900], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=190 THEN QTY END) AS [1900-1909], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=191 THEN QTY END) AS [1910-1919], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=192 THEN QTY END) AS [1920-1929], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=193 THEN QTY END) AS [1930-1939], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=194 THEN QTY END) AS [1940-1949], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=195 THEN QTY END) AS [1950-1959], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=196 THEN QTY END) AS [1960-1969], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=197 THEN QTY END) AS [1970-1979], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=198 THEN QTY END) AS [1980-1989], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=199 THEN QTY END) AS [1990-1999], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=200 THEN QTY END) AS [2000-2009], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=201 THEN QTY END) AS [2010-2019], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=202 THEN QTY END) AS [2020-2029]
INTO #MAIN2 FROM (SELECT pref_tli_key, Decade, dcount as qty From #main) as D
Group by pref_tli_key
SELECT ITN2.actual_name, ITN2.Authority, ITN2.Common_name, TG.Taxon_Group_name, M.* FROM #Main2 M INNER JOIN index_taxon_name ITN ON ITN.Taxon_List_item_key = m.pref_TLI_Key INNER JOIN index_taxon_name ITN2 ON ITN2.taxon_list_item_key = ITN.Recommended_taxon_list_Item_Key INNER JOIN taxon_list_item TLI ON TLI.taxon_list_item_key = ITN.taxon_List_item_key INNER JOIN taxon_version TV ON TV.Taxon_Version_key = TLI.Taxon_Version_Key LEFT JOIN taxon_group TG ON TV.output_group_key = TG.Taxon_Group_Key WHERE ITN.System_Supplied_Data = 1 AND ITN2.System_Supplied_Data = 1
DROP Table #Taxa DROP TABLE #Main

CREATE TABLE #Taxa (TLI_Key char(16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS, RecTLI_Key char(16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS) INSERT INTO #Taxa (TLI_KEY,RecTLI_Key) SELECT DISTINCT ITN2.Taxon_List_Item_Key, ITN2.Recommended_Taxon_List_Item_Key FROM Taxon_List_Item TLI INNER JOIN Index_Taxon_Name ITN ON TLI.Taxon_List_Item_Key = ITN.Taxon_List_Item_Key INNER JOIN Index_Taxon_Name ITN2 ON ITN.Recommended_Taxon_List_Item_Key =ITN2.Recommended_Taxon_List_Item_Key WHERE
TLI.Taxon_List_Item_Key = '%s'
CREATE TABLE #Main (Pref_TLI_Key char(16) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS, decade char(3) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS, dCount int)
INSERT INTO #Main (pref_TLI_key,decade,dcount) SELECT #Taxa.RecTLI_Key, dbo.LCReturnDate(s.Vague_Date_end, s.Vague_Date_Type,'B') as decade, count(TOCC.taxon_occurrence_key ) as dCount FROM Taxon_occurrence TOCC INNER JOIN SAMPLE S ON TOCC.Sample_Key = S.Sample_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_Determination TDET ON TDET.Taxon_Occurrence_Key = TOCC.Taxon_Occurrence_Key INNER JOIN #Taxa on TDET.Taxon_List_Item_Key = #Taxa.TLI_Key INNER JOIN Survey_Event SE ON SE.Survey_Event_key = S.Survey_Event_Key LEFT JOIN User_Survey_Restriction USR ON USR.Survey_Key = SE.Survey_Key AND
WHERE USR.Name_Key IS NULL AND TDET.PREFERRED = 1 AND Tocc.zero_abundance = 0 AND TOCC.Verified <> 1 AND S.vague_Date_Type not in('U','Y-','C-','S') GROUP BY #Taxa.RecTLI_Key,dbo.LCReturnDate(s.Vague_Date_end, s.Vague_Date_Type,'B')
SELECT PREF_TLI_KEY,
SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE<190 THEN QTY END) AS [BEFORE 1900], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=190 THEN QTY END) AS [1900-1909], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=191 THEN QTY END) AS [1910-1919], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=192 THEN QTY END) AS [1920-1929], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=193 THEN QTY END) AS [1930-1939], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=194 THEN QTY END) AS [1940-1949], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=195 THEN QTY END) AS [1950-1959], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=196 THEN QTY END) AS [1960-1969], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=197 THEN QTY END) AS [1970-1979], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=198 THEN QTY END) AS [1980-1989], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=199 THEN QTY END) AS [1990-1999], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=200 THEN QTY END) AS [2000-2009], SUM(CASE WHEN DECADE=201 THEN QTY END) AS [2010-2019]
INTO #MAIN2 FROM (SELECT pref_tli_key, Decade, dcount as qty From #main) as D Group by pref_tli_key
SELECT ITN2.actual_name, ITN2.Authority, ITN2.Common_name, TG.Taxon_Group_name, M.* FROM #Main2 M INNER JOIN index_taxon_name ITN ON ITN.Taxon_List_item_key = m.pref_TLI_Key INNER JOIN index_taxon_name ITN2 ON ITN2.taxon_list_item_key = ITN.Recommended_taxon_list_Item_Key INNER JOIN taxon_list_item TLI ON TLI.taxon_list_item_key = ITN.taxon_List_item_key INNER JOIN taxon_version TV ON TV.Taxon_Version_key = TLI.Taxon_Version_Key LEFT JOIN taxon_group TG ON TV.output_group_key = TG.Taxon_Group_Key WHERE ITN.System_Supplied_Data = 1 AND ITN2.System_Supplied_Data = 1
DROP Table #Taxa DROP TABLE #Main
